content: Created `pyproject.toml` with package metadata, required dependencies (including `jsonschema`), and console script entry points for schema doc generation and benchmark output validation.

output.code:
from pathlib import Path
import json, textwrap, os

target_path = Path('/mnt/data').joinpath('pyproject.toml')
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = [
"""[build-system]
requires = ["setuptools>=69", "wheel"]
build-backend = "setuptools.build_meta" """,
"""[project]
name = "benchmark-output-tools"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "Tools for generating schema docs and validating benchmark JSON outputs against JSON Schema."
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.10"
license = {text = "MIT"}
authors = [{name = "OpenAI (generated)"}]
dependencies = [
  "jsonschema>=4.21",
  "referencing>=0.34",
]""",
"""[project.scripts]
schema-docs = "tools.schema_docs:main"
validate-benchmark-outputs = "tools.validate_benchmark_outputs:main" """,
"""[tool.setuptools]
package-dir = {"" = "."}

[tool.setuptools.packages.find]
include = ["tools*"]""",
"""[tool.pytest.ini_options]
addopts = "-q"
testpaths = ["tests"]""",
"""[tool.ruff]
line-length = 100
target-version = "py310"

[tool.ruff.lint]
select = ["E", "F", "I"]""",
"""[tool.black]
line-length = 100
target-version = ["py310"]""",
"""[tool.mypy]
python_version = "3.10"
warn_unused_ignores = true
warn_redundant_casts = true
warn_unused_configs = true"""
]

final_text = '\n'.join(block.strip('\n') for block in chunks).strip() + '\n'
target_path.write_text(final_text, encoding='utf-8')
print('FILE_WRITTEN:pyproject.toml')
print('DIR_STATE:' + json.dumps(sorted(str(p.relative_to(Path("/mnt/data"))) for p in target_path.parent.glob('*') if p.is_file())))

content.text: Created `pyproject.toml` with package metadata, required dependencies (including `jsonschema`), and console script entry points for schema doc generation and benchmark output validation.
